items.title: Will the Democrats go "dark woke" to take on Trump?
items.summary: California's governor has been imitating the president online.

items.title: Mayawati appoints nephew Akash Anand as BSP national convenor
items.summary: According to party sources, Akash's responsibility will be to review the work of all sectors, central and state coordinators and state presidents; he will report directly to Mayawati

items.title: Zelenskyy seeks talks with Trump, European leaders on slow progress of peace efforts with Russia
items.summary: Mr. Zelenskyy told reporters in Kyiv that he expected “several meetings at different venues” with European leaders next week

items.title: From Spencer Plaza to Marina Beach: Take a nostalgic trip to 90s Madras
items.summary: How much do you miss the Madras of the Nineties? This Madras Month, we take a trip down memory lane

items.title: West Bengal to add 14,000 polling booths next year’s Assembly polls
items.summary: The number of polling booths in the state is about 80,661; if 13,816 booths are added to this, the total number of booths will be 94,497.

items.title: CBI Court convicts 10 including former Jharkhand Minister Anosh Ekka in land acquisition case
items.summary: The central agency in its official press statement stated that CBI had registered the instant case on 11.08.2010 against Hari Narain Rai and Anosh Ekka and others in compliance of the order passed by the Jharkhand High Court.

items.title: U.S. appeals court finds Trump’s global tariffs illegal, but leaves them in place now
items.summary: The 7-4 ruling by the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit affirmed a lower court’s decision finding that Donald Trump had exceeded his authority in tapping emergency economic powers to impose wide-ranging duties

items.title: U.S. revokes visas of Palestinian president, other officials ahead of UN General Assembly
items.summary: The move is the latest in a series of steps the Trump administration has taken to target Palestinians with visa restrictions and comes as the Israeli military declared Gaza's largest city a combat zone

items.title: Noida dowry death: Nikki Bhati’s trial by fire
items.summary: On August 21, Nikki Bhati, 26, died of severe burn injuries in Sirsa, Uttar Pradesh. Married for nine years, Nikki had allegedly complained to her parents often about domestic abuse and dowry demands, but they had urged her to stay on. When Nikki and her sister opened a beauty parlour, the harassmen

items.title: Army, ITBP conduct firepower drills in Arunachal Pradesh
items.summary: The firepower drills were undertaken to ensure seamless coordination in high-altitude operational environments

items.title: Heavy rain batters Delhi; 3 children hurt in wall collapse
items.summary: Safdarjung records 56.2 mm of rain in three hours; PWD control rooms receive over 15 calls about clogged roads, uprooted trees; commuters face delays; failure of ‘four-engine govt.’, says AAP; govt. installed pumps, deployed staff to clear drains: BJP

items.summary: PIL on detention of migrant workers was filed before the Supreme Court by the West Bengal Migrant Welfare Board

items.title: ED conducts searches in FEMA case against Haryana-based real estate firm
items.summary: ED says BPTP Ltd. got FDI of over ₹500 crore from Mauritius-based entities in violation of rules; Agency searches company’s offices as well as residences of its chairman and director

items.title: Military drills spark hundreds of wildfires in UK
items.summary: Live explosives on army training sites in the UK countryside mean many wildfires cannot be tackled.

items.title: Ward councillors in Chennai complain of shortage of road workers to fix potholes
items.summary: They say many roads in residential areas are yet to be repaired, and demand that the Greater Chennai Corporation fill the vacant posts in many of the wards

items.title: A.P. officials on alert as first flood warning level issued for Godavari at Bhadrachalam in Telangana
items.summary: Water level is likely to reach the second warning level of 48 feet at Bhadrachalam on Saturday, says official;  heavy rain is expected in north coastal A.P.

items.title: Across dynasties and decades, Milad-un-Nabi threads faith, festivity and service
items.summary: Hyderabad’s Milad takes on added significance this time as the city joins the global community in marking the 1,500th birth anniversary of Prophet Muhammed with a grand juloos, prayer meetings and service activities

items.title: The ocean’s new eyes: Fishermen to join INCOIS in tracking marine trends
items.summary: As part of a citizen-science push, INCOIS will equip fishermen with sensors and satellite tools to feed real-time data from the sea, strengthening advisories on fishing grounds, safety alerts and long-term ocean research

items.title: Bihar Cabinet approves Mukhya Mantri Mahila Rozgar Yojana
items.summary: As per the scheme, one woman from each family will get ₹10,000 as grant to start a business; this will give women the opportunity to start businesses of their own choice and will create employment opportunities in the State itself
